gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Mediterranean Sea - Temperature and salinity Historical Data Collection SeaDataCloud V1

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
SDC_MED_DATA_TS_V1 SeaDataCloud Temperature and Salinity data collection for the Mediterranean Sea contains all open access temperature and salinity in situ data retrieved from SeaDataNet infrastructure at the end of October 2017. The data span between -9.25 and 37 degrees of longitude, thus including an Atlantic box and the Marmara Sea. It covers the time period 1900-2017. Data have been quality checked using ODV 5.0 software. Quality Flags of anomalous data have been revised using basic QC procedures. The dataset format is ODV binary collections. You can read, analyse and export from the ODV application provided by Alfred Wegener institute at http://odv.awi.de/.
For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org/.

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: SeaDataNet Usage Agreement: If you use SeaDataNet data in your publications please include the following in the Acknowledgements: Data were provided through SeaDataNet Pan-European infrastructure for ocean and marine data management (https://www.seadatanet.org)

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: No limitations on public access. For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services
